name: DuckHunters
description:
I've recreated Duck Hunt for a grad school game design class. Each week I created different iterations of duck hunt some of which expand the formula of the game in various interesting way as well creating vastly different games based of he idea of hunting ducks.

I hope you have as much fun playing my various iterations of duck hunt as I did making them.

TRY DIFFERENT GAME MODES LIKE:

RAPID HUNT

BLIND HUNT

POOPER

AND MANY MORE...
